subject: Project Update
message:
Message-ID: <msg1@enron.com>
Date: Mon, 12 Apr 2025 10:00:00 -0500
From: Alice Johnson <alice.johnson@enron.com>
To: Bob Smith <bob.smith@enron.com>
Subject: Project Update

Hi Bob,

The new project timeline is drafted. Please review and share your thoughts.

Thanks,
Alice

subject: Re: Project Update
message:
Message-ID: <msg2@enron.com>
In-Reply-To: <msg1@enron.com>
References: <msg1@enron.com>
Date: Mon, 12 Apr 2025 11:00:00 -0500
From: Bob Smith <bob.smith@enron.com>
To: Alice Johnson <alice.johnson@enron.com>
Subject: Re: Project Update

Hi Alice,

Thanks for sending. The timeline looks good. Letâ€™s finalize by Wednesday.

Regards,
Bob

subject: URGENT: Financial Report Due Tomorrow
message:
Message-ID: <msg3@enron.com>
Date: Tue, 13 Apr 2025 09:30:00 -0500
From: Carol Lee <carol.lee@enron.com>
To: Finance Team <finance@enron.com>
Subject: URGENT: Financial Report Due Tomorrow

Team,

We must submit the Q1 financial report to the board by tomorrow 5 PM. Please prioritize completing all outstanding sections today.

This is a high-priority task with no delays allowed.

- Carol

subject: Lunch Invitation
message:
Message-ID: <msg4@enron.com>
Date: Tue, 13 Apr 2025 12:00:00 -0500
From: David Green <david.green@enron.com>
To: Alice Johnson <alice.johnson@enron.com>
Subject: Lunch Invitation

Hi Alice,

A few of us are planning to go out for lunch this Friday at 1 PM. Would you like to join?

Best,
David
